account.title: Account settings
account.cannot_edit_profile_description: You cannot edit your profile because you are logged in as the 'owner' user. This user is reserved for system administration.
account.password_change_disabled_description: You cannot change your password because you are logged in as the 'owner' user. This user is reserved for system administration.
account.new_password_min_length: New password must be at least 12 characters long
account.new_password_missing_uppercase: New password must contain at least one uppercase letter
account.new_password_missing_lowercase: New password must contain at least one lowercase letter
account.new_password_missing_digit: New password must contain at least one digit
account.new_password_missing_special_char: New password must contain at least one special character
account.new_password_too_many_repeating_chars: New password contains too many repeating characters
account.new_password_must_be_different_from_curr: New password must be different from current password
account.change_your_temporary_password_descripti: You can find your current password in the email sent when your account was created. This helps protect your account's security.
account.password_changed_description: Your password has been changed successfully
